title: Hey, A little problem with a ingame shop
body: Hey, i have just recently won my game, and got my first win of the day bonus, it took me to 3281 ip, but when i go int the shop ( i intended to buy kat) ( aso let me know who you think is better Kat or LB) but it says i dont have enough RP/IP to get this champ and they are only 3150 ip, anyone else having this problem and can help me

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like the clientside display of your RP/IP totals isnt updating correctly, are you still experiencing this issue?

hey there, 

yes that was my issue, it was displaying what i had said but really i had about 300 ip less, i figured it out when i went to guy a rune for 205 and it said i would have 29something left over, thank you anyway :)
Adding to Sephiroth's post, if you're using the Beta Client, launch the Legacy Client to make your purchase and you can switch back afterwards.
